text:
How would you write an if statement to do something based on if the content is a blog post or a page?

if blog post <--how?
(do this)
else
(do this)
endif

If someone else ends up having the same question. This ended up being the solution: Operators & Expression Tests (<http://HubSpot.com|HubSpot.com><https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/operators-and-expression-tests#string-startingwith|)>

Using an if statement to check if content is part of blog slug.
